articles.title: US pediatricians’ new COVID-19 shot recommendations differ from CDC advice - AP News

articles.title: 'Ketamine Queen' Jasveen Sangha will plead guilty in Matthew Perry case - BBC
articles.description: The American-British dual-national is one of five people who were charged with supplying ketamine to the actor.
articles.content:
Christal Hayes
A woman dubbed the "Ketamine Queen" has agreed to plead guilty of selling the drugs that ultimately killed Friends actor Matthew Perry.
